title: Algorithmic detection of false data injection attacks in cyber-physical systems
summary: This article introduces an anomaly detection based algorithm (AD-CPS) to detect false data injection attacks that fall under the category of data deception/integrity attacks, but with arbitrary information structure, in cyber-physical systems (CPSs) modeled as stochastic linear time-invariant systems.
